env.name: PROJECT
env.label: The name of the project
env.description: The name of the project that will be used to create the Traefik endpoints. Must be URL safe.

env.name: ENTRYPOINTS
env.label: Visibility
env.description: If it's private it's visible only from inside the VPN. Otherwise it's globally accessible.

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Domain
env.description: Must be the same as Visibility

env.name: CERTIFICATE
env.label: Certificate resolver
env.description: Must be the same as Visibility

env.name: DATABASE_NAME
env.label: The name of the database
env.description: The name of the main database.

env.name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.
